item.title: Colombia’s Bogotá Audiovisual Market (BAM) Hits Record Attendance, Prizes ‘Tokyo Forever,’ ‘Pyme, Why Do I Deserve This?’
item.description: Colombia’s ever-expanding Bogota Audiovisual Market (BAM) wrapped July 18, citing record attendance that has climbed steadily year after year. Led by Carlos Eduardo Moreno, BAM reported 2,275 accredit
